=== Current Issues ===

* Suspend and hibernate not activated in /usr/share/acpi-support/FUJITSU SIEMENS.config (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+bug/77212|#77212]]</nowiki>)
* Main volume does not actually exist. Speakers' volume is called 'Internal speaker' and is set to zero by default. (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+bug/77214|#77214]]</nowiki>)
